extension.description: Eminence is a skin that seeks simplicity, functionality, and elegance with a modern look

FluxTV is a skin for XBMC 9.11 and above. It is a combination of concepts from many popular skins, and attempts to embrace and integrate their good ideas into a skin that should be easy for first time XBMC users to understand and use.

FluxTV is a skin for XBMC 9.11 and above. It is a combination of concepts from many popular skins, and attempts to embrace and integrate their good ideas into a skin that should be easy for first time XBMC users to understand and use.

FluxTV is a skin for XBMC 9.11 and above. It is a combination of concepts from many popular skins, and attempts to embrace and integrate their good ideas into a skin that should be easy for first time XBMC users to understand and use.
FluxTV is een skin voor XBMC 9.11 en hoger. Het combineert de concepten van andere populaire skins, waarbij het tracht hun goede ideeën te integreren in een skin die gemakkelijk in gebruik is.
extension.disclaimer: FluxTV is the default skin for XBMC, removing it may cause issues
